Text:
works great with Free McBoot + ESR

I did find a little glitch tho
the star power is infinite (well for me it is)
i'm sorry to ask but is this for ps2 or can i play it on my pc?
both i use my PS2 but with a emulator you could play it on PC
thanks, btw is it pal or ntsc?
Do I need a guitar for pc or can I use my keyboard when using the ps2 emulator?

n00b_king, about the glitch, it's sad but when i did this hack i tried many and many times to remove this glitch but i couldn't. Some songs work fine and the star power ends normally, but others i don't know why but the star power is infinite, i think that probably the problem is with the "chart".

Anyway, i hope you're enjoying the game.

i am enjoying it :)
even with that little glitch its still very fun and i love it so in short you get a cookie :D

this game works in a normal 4.7gb dvd? 
and in a normal ps2 too? XD

well can your PS2 play back up games?

and yes 4.7 will work :)
